title: Five Complete Miss Marple Novels: The Mirror Crack'd / A Caribbean Mystery / Nemesis / What Mrs. McGillicuddy Saw! / The Body in the Library
description: "Agatha Christie: Five Complete Miss Marple Novels" Complete and unabridged.The Mirror Crack'd,A Caribbean Mystery,Nemesis,What Mrs. McGillicuddy Saw! (aka 4:50 from Paddington), andThe Body in the Library.Librarian's note: this entry is for the collection of five novels. Each of them individually, as well as the other seven Miss Marple novels, and the 20 short stories, can be found elsewhere on Goodreads.
author: Agatha Christie
